gameDetails.name: Mombasa: Cooked Books Mini Expansion
gameDetails.description:
Contained in the Deutscher Spielepreis 2016 Goodie Box

Includes 6 book tiles and 1 bookkeeper tile

Setup:
Add the new book tiles to the ones from the base game.
Place the bookkeeper tile next to the game board. This bonus space is an additional bonus space and remains there for the duration of the game

Game Play:
Pay the amount depicted on the bonus tile to acquire it. At the end of the game, the bonus values of all new book tiles that your ink jar has reached or passed are added to your bookkeeping scoring category

Majority bonus bookkeeper space:
If no other player has a higher total of bookkeepers, you may place here. You bookkeepers are not used up by this action.

Reward: 
1 bookkeeper gets you 2 pounds from the bank. 
2 bookkeepers gets you 5 pounds from the bank
3 or more bookkeepers gets you 9 pounds from the bank
